meanings.definition: Reaching the highest point or final stage.
meanings.sent1: The culminant moment of the movie was when the hero defeated the villain.
meanings.sent2: The climber reached the culminant peak of the mountain after a long journey.
meanings.sent3: The cake's culminant layer was decorated with colorful sprinkles.
meanings.sent4: The culminant scene in the play left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent5: The culminant sunset painted the sky in vibrant hues.

meanings.definition: The highest or most intense point in a process or development.
meanings.sent1: The concert reached its culminant when the band played their hit song.
meanings.sent2: The culminant of the party was when the birthday cake was brought out.
meanings.sent3: The culminant of the race was when the tortoise unexpectedly won.
meanings.sent4: The culminant of the argument was when both parties finally reached a compromise.
meanings.sent5: The culminant of the storm was the deafening thunder that shook the windows.
